analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kilesa saṅkilesika duka
translated: The Pairs on Defilement and Corruption, etc.🔽With a defiled and not corrupted states as condition, a defiled and not corrupted states arises … (in three ways).🔽With a not corrupted and not defiled and a defiled states as condition, a not corrupted and not defiled states arises … (in three ways).

original: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Naasaṅkilesikañceva nano ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkilesiko ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Nakilesañceva naasaṅkilesikañca naasaṅkilesikañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkilesikam ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na asaṅkilesikaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na asaṅkilesikam ca iva na no ca kilesam dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkilesikaḥ ca iva na no ca kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na kilesam ca iva na asaṅkilesikam ca na asaṅkilesikam ca iva na no ca kilesam ca dhammam paṭicca na kilesaḥ ca iva na asaṅkilesikaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a defiled and not corrupted and a not corrupted and not defiled states as condition, a defiled and not corrupted states arises … (in three ways).🔽(In brief).
